messages.message:
I can confirm that this solved the issue :slightly_smiling_face:

 But yes, please let's make sure the mapping is correct when spinning up the SaaS sandbox.
Yes let's check this patch into git (or change in base config) if we know this is always necessary for a group of environments
@lydia - I think we need to update this Azure deployment map everywhere if gpt-3.5-turbo-0301 is the default over gpt-3.5-turbo (or at least for environments 23.07+)
@Yash Botadra can you update the default value in AZURE_MODEL_DEPLOYMENT_MAP to the correct value? I think maybe some just missed that config when we set the default value
Will do. Can someone (maybe @Jasper?) share the correct default value? Is it `{\"text-davinci-003\":\"text-davinci-003\", \"gpt-3.5-turbo-0301\": \"gpt-35-turbo-0301\"}` ?

The below is what I updated the value to but I think there is a unneccesary duplicate in there @Yash Botadra

```apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: deployment-model-service
  namespace: insan-euc1-vr-smartfinanz-instabase
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: model-service
          env:
            - name: AZURE_MODEL_DEPLOYMENT_MAP
              value: '{"text-davinci-003":"text-davinci-003", "gpt-3.5-turbo-0301": "gpt-35-turbo", "gpt-3.5-turbo": "gpt-35-turbo"}'```
